properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:09PM CST until January 24 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* from Tuesday January 14 until Thursday January 23.
* At 11 AM Friday the stage was...34.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 39.5 feet on Saturday January 18.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday January 14 and
continue to rise to near 39.5 feet by Saturday January 18. The
river will fall below flood stage by Thursday January 23.
At 40.0 feet, In Tennessee, long sections of Tiptonville Ferry Road
are flooded..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
